topic.title: Highlights are Spanning Unexpectedly to the End of the Page

body.p: If the change tracking insertions, comments, or higlights are coloring a larger than expected area, the markup that signals their end is missing.

To fix this, open the topic in which the highlights starts and check if the XML processing instructions that define the end of the highlighted interval are correct. The intervals are defined as follows:
Make sure all the ending processing instructions are located before the root element end tag.
